subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Steelers’ James Harrison, the defensive player of the year, took a circuitous route to N.F.L. success, overcoming a couple of brushes with the law and learning from his mistakes.
snippet: The Steelers’ James Harrison, the defensive player of the year, took a circuitous route to N.F.L. success, overcoming a couple of brushes with the law and learning from his mistakes.
